title: The Lego Batman Movie
description: Batman works with a team to defeat the Joker and save Gotham City.

title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is offered a chance to have his past crimes forgiven, as payment for planting an idea into a CEO's mind.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster, and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The story of Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ, who accomplishes incredible things in his life and meets historical figures along the way.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman general sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Braveheart
description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: During the Normandy Invasion of World War II, a group of U.S. soldiers goes behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: Goodfellas
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife and his mob partners over a period of 25 years.

title: The Green Mile
description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: American Beauty
description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine on an alien planet becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: The Lion King
description: A lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile.

title: Jurassic Park
description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop a mischievous god and an alien invasion that threatens humanity.

title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
description: A reluctant hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Peter Parker's secret identity is exposed, bringing him, his friends, and his loved ones into grave danger.

title: The Social Network
description: Mark Zuckerberg creates Facebook and is later sued by twins who claim he stole their idea and by a co-founder who was later squeezed out.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse the actions of Thanos and restore balance to the universe.

title: Toy Story
description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

title: The Prestige
description: Two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

title: The Sixth Sense
description: A young boy who communicates with spirits that don’t know they’re dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

title: Se7en
description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: The Usual Suspects
description: A sole survivor tells the twisted events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which begin when five criminals meet at a seemingly random police lineup.

title: The Truman Show
description: An insurance salesman discovers his entire life is actually a reality TV show.

title: Black Swan
description: A committed dancer wins the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's 'Swan Lake' only to find herself struggling to maintain her sanity.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the help of a drifter named Max.

title: Memento
description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

title: Whiplash
description: A young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

title: Her
description: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

title: Django Unchained
description: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

title: The Big Lebowski
description: Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime and corruption.

title: Good Will Hunting
description: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

title: Catch Me If You Can
description: A seasoned FBI agent pursues Frank Abagnale Jr., who, before his 19th birthday, successfully performed cons worth millions of dollars.

title: Requiem for a Dream
description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island individuals are shattered when their addictions become stronger.

title: The Imitation Game
description: During World War II, mathematician Alan Turing tries to crack the enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians.

title: The Pursuit of Happyness
description: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional endeavor.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel and hears his tale of the hotel's glory days.

title: Inglourious Basterds
description: In Nazi-occupied France, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theater owner's vengeful plans.

title: Snatch
description: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, and amateur robbers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

title: Shutter Island
description: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

title: V for Vendetta
description: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

title: Amélie
description: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and along the way discovers love.

title: Children of Men
description: In a dystopian future where humans have become infertile, a disillusioned bureaucrat is tasked with helping a miraculously pregnant woman get to sanctuary.

title: Oldboy
description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings.

title: Scarface
description: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

title: Parasite
description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: The Intouchables
description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

title: Gone Girl
description: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

title: Inside Out
description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions struggle to adjust to a new life.

title: Coco
description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

title: La La Land
description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

title: The Lego Movie
description: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied 'Special', is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

title: The Lego Ninjago Movie
description: Shunned by everyone for being the son of an evil warlord, a teenager seeks to defeat him with the help of his fellow ninjas.

title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
description: It's been five years since everything was awesome, and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: LEGO DUPLO invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild.

title: Lego: The Adventures of Clutch Powers
description: For the first time ever, see the world of LEGO come to life in the all-new feature-length DVD movie adventure with Clutch Powers, the best builder and explorer in the LEGO universe.

title: Lego Star Wars: The Padawan Menace
description: A routine Jedi Academy field trip is turned into a rip-roaring comic adventure in LEGO Star Wars: The Padawan Menace.

title: Lego Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Out
description: Luke Skywalker embarks on a mission to find and destroy a new Imperial weapon, but he is distracted by his newfound fame as a hero.

title: Lego Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles – The Phantom Clone
description: Yoda and the ghost of Qui-Gon Jinn make a disturbing discovery: someone is creating a clone army in the Republic's name.

title: Lego Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles – Menace of the Sith
description: Darth Sidious shows off the new Sith clone JEK-14 to Count Dooku, General Grievous, and Asajj Ventress.

title: Lego Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles – Attack of the Jedi
description: The Jedi discover that Count Dooku has been creating a new Sith clone army.

title: Lego Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles – Escape from the Jedi Temple
description: The Emperor uses the information on the Holocrons to launch an attack on the Jedi Temple.

title: Lego Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles – Race for the Holocrons
description: Luke Skywalker leads a mission to rebuild the Jedi Temple.

title: Lego Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles – Raid on Coruscant
description: The Emperor uses the information on the Holocrons to launch an attack on the Jedi Temple.

title: Lego Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles – Clash of the Skywalkers
description: Luke Skywalker leads a mission to rebuild the Jedi Temple.

title: Lego Star Wars: Droid Tales
description: After the victory celebration on Endor, R2-D2 and C-3PO are captured by a mysterious figure.

title: Lego Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures
description: Set between 'The Empire Strikes Back' and 'Return of the Jedi', the series follows the Freemakers, a family of scavengers who operate a salvage and repair shop in space.

title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League vs. Bizarro League
description: Batman joins forces with the Justice League when Bizarro and the Legion of Doom threaten to destroy the planet.

title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League - Attack of the Legion of Doom!
description: Crime is on the rise in Metropolis, and the Justice League can’t fight it alone. Lex Luthor forms the Legion of Doom and recruits new villains to fight against the heroes.

title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League – Cosmic Clash
description: Brainiac wants to add Earth to his collection, so the Justice League must team up to save the world from destruction.

title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League – Gotham City Breakout
description: When Batman goes on vacation with Batgirl and Nightwing, the Justice League takes over patrolling Gotham City.

title: Lego Marvel Super Heroes: Maximum Overload
description: The mischievous Loki is back, and he’s got an army of supervillains to help him attack Earth.

title: Lego Marvel Super Heroes: Avengers Reassembled
description: The Avengers face off against Ultron, who has taken over Iron Man's armor, in this animated LEGO Marvel Super Heroes adventure.

title: Lego Friends: Girlz 4 Life
description: The LEGO Friends group form a band, but their friendship is tested when their hit song is stolen by a pop star.

title: Lego Jurassic World: The Indominus Escape
description: In this short LEGO film, Jurassic World goes awry when the Indominus Rex escapes.

title: Lego Elves: Secrets of Elvendale
description: A young girl travels to a magical land called Elvendale, where she and her elven friends must save the kingdom from an evil force.

title: Lego DC Super Hero Girls: Brain Drain
description: The DC Super Hero Girls discover that they’ve been the target of a plot to erase their memories and unleash chaos.

title: Lego DC Super Hero Girls: Super-Villain High
description: Wonder Woman, Batgirl, and Supergirl investigate when their class is invited to Super-Villain High.
